text.tspan: Compare options by comparing 'areas'. Areas are the attributes such as cost, performance, etc.
Use a number system from 1-10 for each option. Circle the final decision made.
Describe the forces at play, including technological,
Describe the facts as you know them

svg.text: Are their any biases coloring the decsion?

text.style: fill: rgb(148, 148, 148); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 8px; white-space: pre-wrap;

svg.text: What type of decision is this?

text.style: fill: rgb(122, 122, 122); font-size: 12px; font-style: italic; stroke-width: 2px; white-space: pre-wrap;

svg.text: V3.07 2020-11-29 Contributors include Iasa and Gar Mac Críosta

text.tspan: How are we making this decision.

text.style: fill: rgb(148, 148, 148); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 8px; white-space: pre-wrap;
fill: rgb(148, 148, 148); font-family: Verdana; font-size: 8px; white-space: pre-wrap;

svg.text: Why did we choose this option?​Are there any side-effects or impacts ​resulting form this decision? ​​​
How much of the enterprise is ​affected by the decision? what safety​tier is impacted by this decsion?
What other decsions are related to this decsion?
